response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its worth of $12,000 to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This offer is exclusive and tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment. Should you decide to accept this offer, we assure you a seamless transaction and exceptional service. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.", "product_price": 10000}
